privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Noura, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application.
privacy.section1Content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, configure app settings, or contact us for support. This may include your email address and app preferences.
privacy.section2Content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, including to deliver personalized prayer times, track your spiritual progress, and send you notifications you have opted into.
privacy.section3Content: Your personal data is stored securely and we implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.section4Content: We may use third-party services for analytics and crash reporting. These services collect anonymized data to help us improve the app experience.
privacy.section5Content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time. You can do this through the app settings or by contacting us directly.
privacy.section6Content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date.
privacy.section7Content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at getnouraapp@gmail.com.
